transcript: one of the best door knockers I ever heard he said I wouldn't stop knocking doors until I got 20 appointment set and he would count the number out loud as he went from house to house as soon as he'd get one he would say one one one one one he was a psychopath but he also was one of the top producing door knockers of all time for that company and then he' hit the second door and he get it and he's like two and he would not stop until he hit 20 and as soon as he hit 20 it was either at lunchtime midday afternoon it was dark at night he wouldn't stop until he hit the goal
